page.title: 11CUSTOMS
page.content: On Monday there is a Majorette competition, Tuesday there is a beetle drive. On Wednesday there is a donkey derby.Thursday is a quiet day.On Friday there is a disco.On Sunday there is a big service in the church followed by a{St.Day}biscuit for everyone.{On Feast Monday}there is a procession though the streets of{ {St.Day}to the Playing Field where they have their sports.In the evening is the{St.Day dance}through the streets.The children perform their dance first and the adults later. The ladies wear long dresses and a flower in their hair.The men wear dark trousers and a shirt to match the lady's dress.The dance began in 1976.The tune was composed by Mr.Kenneth Pelmear of{St.Day.
